Name: Hunchback
Details: The Hunchback is a well-known and respected medium BattleMech weighing in at 50 tons. The name comes from the oversized right torso, within which is typically mounted a much larger weapon than is commonly seen on 'Mechs of its tonnage. Examples include the HBK-4G, which carries an Autocannon/20, or the HBK-4P, which carries a full battery of six medium lasers.
